name: .MEDUSA File Extension
summary: Learn about .MEDUSA files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: Because MEDUSA files are encrypted, you cannot open them. At this time, there is no program that can restore MEDUSA files to their original state. The best way to restore files encrypted by Medusa ransomware is to retrieve them from a recent backup or perform a System Restore.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
